CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 8 Such comparable high mobility is beneficial for charge transfer in the resulting PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs: Perovskite Solar Cells

So, the Material Name entity in the paragraph is "PSCs" or Perovskite Solar Cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Paragraph: 8 Such comparable high mobility is beneficial for charge transfer in PSCs.

Material Name: PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 8 Such comparable high mobility is beneficial for charge transfer in the resulting PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. Comparable high mobility: This refers to the degree of ease with which charges (electrons or holes) can move through a material. In this context, it is likely that "mobility" is the property name, as it describes a physical property of the material that affects charge transfer in the resulting PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.
1. High mobility: This refers to the degree of ease with which charges can move through a material.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 8 Such comparable high mobility is beneficial for charge transfer in the resulting PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. Comparable high mobility: This is a property value describing the level of mobility of certain entities in PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells). Mobility is a measure of how easily a charge carrier (electron or hole) moves through a material. In this context, "comparable high mobility" implies that the mobility of the charge carriers in the PSCs is similar and relatively high.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
1. Comparable high mobility: This is a property value describing the level of mobility of charge carriers in PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| Comparable high mobility |

This table represents the property value "Comparable high mobility" that is mentioned in the paragraph.
